name: Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla
address: Boulevard Kukulcan South North Km 12 5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Hello and welcome to Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla, a new, urban hotel beside the lagoon in Cancun hotel zone. Enjoy being steps from some of the best shopping brands, restaurants and white sand beaches. We will introduce you to the neighborhood with a local welcome gift at check-in. At Canopy, we have got you covered. Our Just-Right Rooms are comfortable, modern spaces with the amenities you want, like free WiFi, a 55-inch HDTV, murals from local artists and our exclusively designed Canopy beds. Deluxe rooms feature views of the ocean and double shower, while our suites include a living room, dining area, espresso/bar cart and hanging chair as well as signature Canopy bathrobe. Feel better going forward and fill up your bottles with filtered water on every floor. Welcome the day in the cafe with a delicious artisanal breakfast made with fresh ingredients and local produce or have a Canopy Break Fast bag delivered to your door. Dine at Azulinda Cafe and Bar or head to the roof to sip cocktails, fresh juices or coffee al fresco. Enjoy the view while working out or relaxing poolside at our rooftop fitness center and outdoor pool. If there is business to be done, settle into our co-working space with comfortable seating and plenty of charging outlets. We also offer three boardrooms for meetings and events, and our beautiful terrace will accommodate up to 36 guests. Enjoy all Hilton Honors benefits at our Energizing hotel.Hilton

name: Dreams Vista Cancun Golf & Spa Resort
address: Lote I-03 Manzana 12 Supermanzana 84, 77520 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Dreams Vista Cancun is an all-new, all ocean view, family resort! Set beachfront along the Caribbean Sea, there’s activities for the kid in everyone—a beautiful beach, four pools and watersports galore. The resort’s prime location is close to the wonders and ruins of the Mayan Riviera, and right next door to the Puerto Cancun Golf Club The brand new, modern rooms and suites at Dreams Vista Cancun all offer ocean views from a private, furnished balcony or terrace, an in-room mini-bar and more. Connecting rooms, family suites, and Sun Club upgrades are also available. All rooms and suites are non-smoking.WebBeds

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Cancun Hotel Zone
address: Blvrd. Kukulcan Lt. 1-02 Zona Hotelera Km. 23.5 MZ60, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Set a pace that suits you at Residence Inn Cancun Hotel. Whether you're with us for a few days, a few weeks, or a few months, your daily routine matters. With a location in Cancun's hotel zone area within the Nizuc channel reserve, surrounded by nature, just 9 km away from the Airport. Enjoy complimentary breakfast, Wi-Fi and connect to work and the outside world. Work up a sweat in our hotel's fitness center, ready for strengthening body and mind. Relax and unwind when you want. Thrive at our extended-stay hotel with the conveniences you need, like pet-friendly studios, one- and two-bedroom suites with separate living and sleeping areas. Take advantage of Cancun's bounteous produce in your hotel room's fully equipped kitchen, ready for your favorite cuisine. At Residence Inn, we welcome you to Mexico with open arms. Pets are allowed at our hotel too, so everyone in your family is welcome.Marriott

name: The Fives Oceanfront
address: Av. Javier Rojo Gomez SM 002 Mza 25 LT 1, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Puerto Morelos, a few steps from Playa Puerto Morelos, The Fives Oceanfront offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. The Fives Oceanfront features certain units with city views, and all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at The Fives Oceanfront can enjoy a continental breakfast. You can play table tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling. Cancun Underwater Museum is 30 km from the hotel, while ADO International Bus Station is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 25 km from The Fives Oceanfront.

name: Holiday Inn Express Cabo San Lucas
address: Corredor Csl - Sjd Km. 4.5, 23454 San José del Cabo, Baja California Sur
description: Holiday Inn Express Cabo San Lucas is strategically located at the entrance of the main town. From there, you can arrive to Costco and Office Max by walking. For the golf enthusiasts, Campo San Lucas Golf Course is located about 10 minutes distance from the resort with discounts for our honorable guests. Puerto Paraiso, (Cabo San Lucas most acclaimed shopping mall where you can find any type of souvenir shops, go to the movies, or go to the casino, and do other types of activities.) is located just about 15 minutes from the resort. Also, places like the main town, the “La Marina” Harbor, and the most notorious public beaches, are in the vicinity of that shopping mall. Moreover, The heart of the town welcomes those who love nightlife entertainment. Enjoy a complimentary and delicious buffet breakfast in the mornings. Use the business center available 24 hours, and stay in shape with the courtesy membership access for our guests to the best Gymnasium of Los Cabos, “Cabo Fitness Club”. Feel relaxed in our open roof swimming pool with an outstanding view to the famous rock arch formation “El Arco de Cabo San Lucas”, also know as The Arch of Lands End. Escape to one of the vast activities that the destination offers you like snorkeling, scuba diving, visits to the Arch, Water Sports and tours to the main attractions of the surrounding areas.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Leo's Baja Oasis
address: Ignacio Allende 440, 23000 La Paz, Baja California Sur
description: Boasting pool with a view, garden and views of mountain, Leo's Baja Oasis is located in La Paz, 1.5 km from La Paz Malecon Beach. Featuring full-day security, this property also provides guests with a water park. Guests can make use of the sun terrace or the outdoor fireplace, or enjoy views of the pool and garden. Guest rooms are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, a microwave, a coffee machine, a walk-in shower, a hair dryer and a outdoor furniture. Each room has a kettle, a private bathroom and free WiFi, while selected rooms are fitted with a balcony and some have sea views. At the guest house the rooms include bed linen and towels. Leo's Baja Oasis offers a hot tub. The area is popular for cycling and hiking, and car hire is available at the accommodation. Laundry facilities, free private parking and a business centre are available, as well as a 24-hour front desk. Barco Hundido Beach is 2.5 km from Leo's Baja Oasis, while La Posada Beach is 3 km away. The nearest airport is Manuel Márquez de León International, 9 km from the guest house, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Mondavi
address: Paseo de los Corales 135, 48390 Puerto Vallarta, Jalisco
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 14 air-conditioned rooms featuring microwaves and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Take advantage of recreation opportunities including an outdoor pool and a spa tub. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a banquet hall. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Free valet parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Hotel Mondavi in Puerto Vallarta (Conchas Chinas), you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Malecon and Cruise Ship Terminal. This hotel is 0.9 mi (1.4 km) from Bay of Banderas and 1.4 mi (2.2 km) from Playa de los Muertos. Dining Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The hotel also offers 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: Resort fee: 10 percent of room rate The resort fee includes:Beach towels Housekeeping In-room bottled water In-room safe Parking Phone calls Spa tub access We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Pet fee: USD 10 per accommodation, per day Service animals are exempt from fees A kitchen/kitchenette is available for an additional fee Rollaway bed fee: USD 20 per day The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets allowed Pet max weight (per pet) in kg is 20 Pet max weight (per pet) in lb is 44 Only dogs and cats are allowed Maximum number of pets per room 1 Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions Pets cannot be left unattended General instructions No cribs (infant beds) available Essential workers only - NO Property uses a professional cleaning service Property is cleaned with disinfectant Social distancing measures are in place Contactless check-in is available Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Gap period enforced between guest stays - 24 hours Bed sheets and towels are washed at a temperature of at least 60°C/140°F Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Contactless check-out is available Professional property host/managerViajes Exito Hotels
